resources.string: Do you want to remove following number from the secondary alarm list:
No number for secondary alarm exists, can\'t remove number!
Enter a phone number that Sms Alarm alerts the primary alarm on.
Enter a phone number that Sms Alarm alerts the secondary alarm on. The phone number is added to the list of secondary alarm.
Enter a phone number that the application acknowledge to.
Waiting for the alarm to be acknowledged..
NOTE! It can take up to 40 seconds before the acknowledgement is performed.
The phone numbers for primary- and secondary alarm can not be the same! Enter another phone number.
You can not specify an empty phone number for the secondary alarm. Enter another phone number.
Given phone number already exists in the list for secondary alarms! Enter another phone number.
Can not acknowledge! No number to acknowledge to is specified!

Set which numbers that Sms Alarm shall larm on SMS from. It is possible to set up multiple numbers for secondary alarm through the Add and Remove buttons. Which numbers that are set as secondary alarm can be seen in the list below.
Set alarm signals for primary and secondary alarm, if Sms Alarm should use the phone\'s sound settings and if the alarm signal should by played twice.
Set if the alarm acknowledgement is to be used and in such cases the telephone number as acknowledgement is made against.
Set your rescue services name and enable/disable Sms Alarm.
No numbers for secondary alarm exists!
If selected, Sms Alarm is taking into account the phone call volume and silent mode.
If selected, Sms Alarm trigger an alarm on the given phone numbers, else the application does not.
If selected, Sms Alarm plays the alarmsignal for both primary and secondary alarm twice when an alarm is received.
If selected, a primary alarm can be acknowledged.
Sms Alarm acknowledge to this number
